mapper.insert: insert into member(m_uid, m_id, m_pw, m_name, m_phone, m_email, m_post, m_address, m_address_detail, m_kind, m_status, m_join_date, m_recent_date) values (#{m_uid}, #{m_id}, #{m_pw}, #{m_name}, #{m_phone}, #{m_email}, #{m_post}, #{m_address}, #{m_address_detail}, #{m_kind}, default, default, default)
insert into c_member values (#{m_uid}, #{c_nickname}, #{c_gender}, #{c_birth}, default, default)
mapper.select: select m_uid, m_name, m_post, m_address, m_address_detail, m_kind from member where m_id = #{m_id}
